segments.text: Hi everyone, I am Srivindu Kumar and basically what I am going to show you, this is a demo of
auto video like editor, it's sort of auto video editor.
So whatever you are going to see, whatever captions or subtitles that you are seeing in the background,
it's basically auto generated, it's all been analyzed synthesized and everything is detected by AI
and it has been done by AI.
You might be seeing some sort of like highlighted word here.
You might be seeing some highlighted word.
That highlighted word is also generated via the AI.
It also, it analyzes the context and based on that, it creates and some emphasized word and based on that,
it does all sort of editing.
The color that you are seeing, each and everything is done by AI and by a pipeline.
